content.body: Huh, yeah, that's confusing. I don't know enough about wattsi to debug that.

I remember I did test locally when pushing that change and it did work, in fact, running *html-build* `build.sh --remote` on my machine today does generate the proper class and renders fine for me. The issue might be in the building-pipes.
content.formatted_body: I remember I did test locally when pushing that change and it did work, in fact, running html-build build.sh --remote on my machine today does generate the proper class and renders fine for me. The issue might be in the building-pipes.
